references.paper_title: Image style transfer using convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for neural style transfer, introducing the concept of using convolutional neural networks to transfer artistic style between images.
This paper provides a clear explanation of neural style transfer mechanisms, improving understanding and facilitating further research.

references.paper_title: Arbitrary style transfer in real-time with adaptive instance normalization
references.reason: This work introduced Adaptive Instance Normalization, a significant advancement that enabled faster and more efficient style transfer.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduced latent diffusion models, a crucial advancement in image generation and style transfer that produces high-quality images.

references.paper_title: Dreambooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: Dreambooth is a significant contribution that makes subject-driven image generation more efficient and feasible.
